data.persona: Our royal family is the greatest in history. We have fought and won every war. We are the richest in all the land.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a floor decorations, a ceiling, a flag, a windows, a marbled floor, and a decoration here.
The dancer and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will explore the room and interact with the environment and the people in the room to see where I can find a ladder.
data.mid_motivation: I will leave the Grand Ballroom and find the storage room for the ladder.
data.long_motivation: I will bring the ladder back to the Grand Ballroom so I could climb up to the window, open it and release all the dark musky smell.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: go to different parts of the room.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the ladder from the shelf in the storage room

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go back to the Grand Ballroom floor

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the ladder to the squire
